headline: MGM RESORTS WELCOMES NBCUNIVERSAL EXECUTIVE DONNA LANGLEY TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
summary: LAS VEGAS, March 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- MGM Resorts International today appointed Dame Donna Langley, Chairman of NBCUniversal Entertainment & Studios, to the Company's Board of Directors....
